Name: Nobile Cocktail
Instructions: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add next four ingredients (all but bitter lemon), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with bitter lemon and lightly stir.
Review: Fruity but not sweet, with drying bitter lemon. This is a refreshing, low alcohol, aperitif style summery cocktail.
Garnish: Lemon slice, mint sprig, raspberry & blackberry
